short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: An extension to add an extra confirmation screen to the youtube logout button.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Ever tried to switch youtube account and accidentally clicked sign out? It's quite annoying and there should be a confirmation dialog by default. But since there isn't, this is your best bet.
ConfirmYoutubeLogout adds an additional confirmation screen when you press Sign Out anywhere on youtube.com.
